title: Calculation of FSI for all purposes shall be on gross area of the CDS
clause_text: Calculation of FSI for all purposes shall be on gross area of the CDS.Provision of LOS, to be kept on the site as per prevailing D.C. Regulations.
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements:

source_pdf.text_snippet: Calculation of FSI for all purposes shall be on gross area of the CDS.Provision of LOS, to be kept on the site as per prevailing D.C. Regulations.
